HIS EXCELLENCY ISHOLA AKINWUNMI AMBODE

The People's Governor Returns

After a transformative tenure that reshaped Lagos State with visionary leadership, pragmatic governance, and unprecedented infrastructural development, the call for his return grows louder. The people remember, the people demand, and the people deserve continuity of excellence.

Join the movement to bring back the architect of modern Lagos, a leader who proved that governance can be both effective and compassionate.

TRANSFORMATIVE ACHIEVEMENTS

INFRASTRUCTURAL REVOLUTION

Governor Ambode's administration was characterized by massive infrastructural development that transformed Lagos into a truly modern megacity.

  • Oshodi Transport Interchange - World-class facility
  • Lagos Theatre in Oregun
  • Complete overhaul of Lagos Island
  • Modernization of Lagos water transportation
  • Construction of the Lagos Airport Road

SECURITY & SAFETY

Under his leadership, Lagos became one of the safest states in Nigeria through strategic investments in security infrastructure.

  • Lagos State Security Trust Fund revitalization
  • Procurement of 100 patrol vehicles, 4 armored personnel carriers
  • Establishment of Lagos State Emergency Management
  • Installation of 10,000 street lights across the state
  • CCTV surveillance system across strategic locations

SOCIAL WELFARE & EMPOWERMENT

Ambode's government prioritized the welfare of Lagosians through innovative social programs and economic empowerment.

  • N25 billion Employment Trust Fund
  • "Ready, Set, Work" youth employability program
  • Lagos State Empowerment Trust Fund
  • Free health missions across all LGAs
  • Support for widows and vulnerable citizens

THE 2027 VISION

The return of His Excellency Ishola Akinwunmi Ambode represents more than a political comeback—it symbolizes the restoration of purposeful governance, accountability, and transformative leadership.

  • Lagos 2.0: Advancing the smart city agenda with digital infrastructure and innovation hubs
  • Economic Renaissance: Creating 1 million new jobs through strategic partnerships and entrepreneurship support
  • Affordable Housing: Delivering 100,000 affordable housing units across all senatorial districts
  • Education Revolution: Complete digitization of public schools and free digital skills training for all students
  • Green Lagos: Making Lagos Africa's first carbon-neutral megacity through sustainable policies

JOIN THE MOVEMENT

Be part of history in the making. Your support, voice, and vote will determine the future of Lagos State. Let's bring back excellence, let's bring back Ambode!

OAM

ODO-AYAN MOVEMENT

Grassroots mobilization for progressive leadership

"As the sponsor of this movement, I, Lanrewaju Lawal, believe in the transformative leadership of His Excellency Ishola Akinwunmi Ambode. We witnessed his exceptional performance as Governor and we are convinced that Lagos needs his return for continuity of excellence and completion of the transformation agenda."

- Lanrewaju Lawal, Convener, Odo-Ayan Movement

AMBODE 2027

The campaign to return His Excellency Ishola Akinwunmi Ambode to Lagos State Government House. Join us in restoring excellence in governance.
